comments.author: dholbert@mozilla.com
comments.text:
STEPS TO REPRODUCE:
1. From objdir of a debug build, run this command, to start mochitest-chrome without autorun:
   python ./_tests/testing/mochitest/runtests.py --chrome
2. In the Firefox window that appears, open Tools menu, Error Console

ACTUAL RESULTS: This error is present in the console:
=========
Error: ASSERTION: browser.js host is inconsistent. Content window has <mochi.test:8888> but cached host is <>.

Source File: chrome://browser/content/browser.js
Line: 9637
=========

Source:
http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/base/content/browser.js?mark=4480-4482#4476
> 4478         var contentHost = gBrowser.contentWindow.location.host;
> 4479         if (this._host !== undefined && this._host != contentHost) {
> 4480             Components.utils.reportError(
> 4481               "ASSERTION: browser.js host is inconsistent. Content window has " +
> 4482               "<" + contentHost + "> but cached host is <" + this._host + ">.\n"
comments.creator: dholbert@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
STEPS TO REPRODUCE:
1. From objdir of a debug build, run this command, to start mochitest-chrome without autorun:
   python ./_tests/testing/mochitest/runtests.py --chrome
2. In the Firefox window that appears, open Tools menu, Error Console

ACTUAL RESULTS: This error is present in the console:
=========
Error: ASSERTION: browser.js host is inconsistent. Content window has <mochi.test:8888> but cached host is <>.

Source File: chrome://browser/content/browser.js
Line: 9637
=========

Source:
http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/base/content/browser.js?mark=4480-4482#4476
> 4478         var contentHost = gBrowser.contentWindow.location.host;
> 4479         if (this._host !== undefined && this._host != contentHost) {

> 4481               "ASSERTION: browser.js host is inconsistent. Content window has " +
> 4482               "<" + contentHost + "> but cached host is <" + this._host + ">.\n"
